title: How TO - Animate Icons

metadata.description: Learn about How TO - Animate Icons with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
Example
content_sections.code:
<script>
function chargebattery() {
var a;
a = document.getElementById("charging");
a.innerHTML = "";
setTimeout(function () {
a.innerHTML = "";
}, 1000);
setTimeout(function () {
a.innerHTML = "";
}, 2000);
setTimeout(function () {
a.innerHTML = "";
}, 3000);
setTimeout(function () {
a.innerHTML = "";
}, 4000);
}
chargebattery();
setInterval(chargebattery, 5000);
</script>
